- Enhanced backend services (analytics, cache middleware)
- Added new UI components (CircuitBreakerStatus, ServiceDegradedBanner, etc.)
- Improved documentation and coordination files
- Updated various frontend services and utilities

* Merge all worktree changes: refactoring, bug fixes, and feature updates
